 2. Weigh out 350.48 g of strontium. 
 3. Weigh out 1182.51 g of thulium.

 5. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Stir the mixture thoroughly using a non-reactive spatula to ensure even distribution.
